channel.title: Disabling multiple login
channel.description: How do you make it so players cant double log? im afraid there might be a dupeing issue with my source and i really want to change this

item.title: Disabling multiple login
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“gimpie, post:6, topic:536529”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=655343.msg4387900#msg4387900 date=1386363955]
when a new player logs in loop through all the online players’ current IP. If they match don’t allow the new account to connect.
[/quote] How would i do this though, like witch file would i edit etc?[/quote]
You’d edit a file like connectionmanager or something. the file that first receives the players connection.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling multiple login
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

gimpie:

No i mean like for everyone, on some servers ive played they wont let you log in with 2 accounts from 1 ip jus like real runescape. how would i do that?[/quote][quote=“Docent, post:2, topic:536529”]Record the players IP, if that IP is attempting to have more than one session on, do not allow them to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling multiple login
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Record the players IP, if that IP is attempting to have more than one session on, do not allow them to connect.

Read full topic
